changelog.news: Hey everyone, just pushed out 1.3.3 update. Play store will review and deploy it soon.
bugfixes: Fixed getting stuck on profile page when unfollowing from IG update
Fix username detection fail during profile switching

changelog.news: Samsung galaxy S7 has been tested alongside Google Pixel 3 (google pixel 3a will most likely work as well). One user has reported Google Pixel 2XL works. Increased 1 user limit to 2 user limit for basic version.
features: Advanced Settings has customizable scrolling speeds (Samsung S7 may need this tweak to scroll quicker)
bugfixes: Sanitize inputs amount to prevent crashes
improvements: Reorganized Success/Fail Logs to view by day

changelog.news: IG is currently disabling recent/top feed due to election misinformation. Go to settings > advanced settings > and turn on Feed Correction to skip feed selection to reduce navigation errors.
